description:
26 years old and a member of "Jaeger". Muscular Irish-American guy, who is tough both physically and mentally. His is laid back and looks out for Yuliy with older brother like attitude. However, he is also too talkative for a "Jaeger". His fighting style is close-range combat and is also an expert in setting up traps for vampires.
Source: Official page
name: Fallon
